form.official-title: To amend title 23, United States Code, to modify a provision relating to the obligation and release of funds.

section.text: Section 118(c)(2) of title 23, United States Code, is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in the matter preceding subparagraph (A), by striking Any funds and inserting the following:
by redesignating subparagraphs (A) and (B) as clauses (i) and (ii), respectively, and indenting appropriately; and
by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.header: Same class of funds no longer authorized
subparagraph.text: If the same class of funds described in subparagraph (A)(i) is no longer authorized in the most recent authorizing law, the funds may be credited to a similar class of funds, as determined by the Secretary.
